description.compact:
Get InvoiceNo
It is made of the document type internal code, followed by a space, followed by the identifier of the document series, followed by (/) and by a sequential number of the document within the series.

Set InvoiceNo
It is made of the document type internal code, followed by a space, followed by the identifier of the document series, followed by (/) and by a sequential number of the document within the series.

return.description: true if the value is valid

description.compact:
Get DocumentStatus
When this method is invoked a new instance of DocumentStatus is created if wasn't before and returned to be populated
<xs:element name="DocumentStatus">

Get InvoiceDate
Sale document’s issue date.
<xs:element ref="InvoiceDate"/>

Set InvoiceDate
Sale document’s issue date.
<xs:element ref="InvoiceDate"/>

Get InvoiceType
The field shall be filled in with: “FT” - Invoice; “FS” - Simplified Invoice issued according to article 40 of the VAT code; “FR” – Invoice-receipt; “ND” - Debit note; “NC” - Credit note; “VD” - Sale for cash and invoice/sales ticket; (a) “TV” - Sale ticket; (a) “TD” - Devolution ticket; (a) “AA” - Assets sales; (a) “DA” - Assets returns. (a) For the Insurance sector when it must not be included in table 4.3. - WorkingDocuments, may also be filled in with: “RP” – Premium or premium receipt; “RE” - Return insurance or receipt of return insurance; “CS” - Imputation to co-insurance companies; “LD” - Imputation to a leader co-insurance company; “RA” - Accepted reinsurance. (a) For data up to 2012-12-31.

Set InvoiceType
The field shall be filled in with: “FT” - Invoice; “FS” - Simplified Invoice issued according to article 40 of the VAT code; “FR” – Invoice-receipt; “ND” - Debit note; “NC” - Credit note; “VD” - Sale for cash and invoice/sales ticket; (a) “TV” - Sale ticket; (a) “TD” - Devolution ticket; (a) “AA” - Assets sales; (a) “DA” - Assets returns. (a) For the Insurance sector when it must not be included in table 4.3. - WorkingDocuments, may also be filled in with: “RP” – Premium or premium receipt; “RE” - Return insurance or receipt of return insurance; “CS” - Imputation to co-insurance companies; “LD” - Imputation to a leader co-insurance company; “RA” - Accepted reinsurance. (a) For data up to 2012-12-31.

Get SpecialRegimes
When this method is invoked a new instance of SpecialRegimes is created if wasn't previous and returned to be populated
<xs:element name="SpecialRegimes" type="SpecialRegimes"/>

Get ShipTo
Information about the place and delivery date of the products that are sold to the client, or anyone assigned by him in the case of triangular transactions.
When this method is invoked if $create is true and wasn't created previous a new instance of ShipTo is created and then returned to be populated
<xs:element ref="ShipTo" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/>

param.description: if true and wasn't previous a new instance will be created

description.compact:
Get ShipFrom
Information about the place and date of the shipping of the goods sold to the customer.

When this method is invoked if $create is true and wasn't created previous a new instance of ShipFrom is created and then returned to be populated
<xs:element ref="ShipFrom" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/>

param.description: if true and wasn't previous a new instance will be created

description.compact:
Set MovementEndTime
[Date and time of the end of the transport]
Date and time type “YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss”, “ss” may be “00” if no specific information is available.
<xs:element ref="MovementEndTime" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/>
<xs:element name="MovementEndTime" type="SAFdateTimeType"/>

Get MovementEndTime
[Date and time of the end of the transport]
Date and time type “YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss”, “ss” may be “00” if no specific information is available.
<xs:element ref="MovementEndTime" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/>
<xs:element name="MovementEndTime" type="SAFdateTimeType"/>

Get MovementStartTime
[Date and time of the beginning of the transport]
Date and time type “YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss”, “ss” may be “00” if no specific information is available.

docblock.description:
The filling is required if the document also serves as a transportation document as provided for under the “Regime de bens em Circulação”
[Goods Circulation Regime], approved by Decree No. 147/2003 of 11th July. <xs:element ref="MovementStartTime" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/>
<xs:element name="MovementStartTime" type="SAFdateTimeType"/>

description.compact:
Set MovementStartTime
[Date and time of the beginning of the transport]
Date and time type “YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss”, “ss” may be “00” if no specific information is available.

docblock.description:
The filling is required if the document also serves as a transportation document as provided for under the “Regime de bens em Circulação”
<xs:element ref="MovementStartTime" maxOccurs="1"/>
<xs:element name="MovementStartTime" type="SAFdateTimeType"/>

description.compact:
Add Line to stack
<xs:element name="Line" maxOccurs="unbounded">

Set DocumentTotals
When this method is invoked a new instance of DocumentTotals is created if wasn't previous and than returned to be populated
<xs:element name="DocumentTotals">

Adds as withholdingTax
When this method is invoked a new instance of WithholdingTax is created, add to the stack and returned to be populated
<xs:element name="WithholdingTax" type="WithholdingTax" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/>

Gets as withholdingTax
<xs:element name="WithholdingTax" type="WithholdingTax" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/>
The calulated values made by the validation classes

<xs:element ref = "HashControl"/> <xs:element name="HashControl" type="SAFPTHashControl"/> <xs:simpleType name="SAFPTHashControl">  <xs:restriction base="xs:string">      <xs:pattern value="[0-9]+|[0-9]+[.][0-9]+|[0-9]+-[A-Z]{2}(M )([^ ]+[/][0-9]+)|[0-9]+-[A-Z]{2}(D )([^ ]+ [^/^ ]+[/][0-9]+)"></xs:pattern>      <xs:minLength value="1"/>      <xs:maxLength value="70"/>  </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType>

<xs:element ref = "Period" minOccurs = "0"/>  <xs:element name="Period">    <xs:simpleType>       <xs:restriction base="xs:integer">           <xs:minInclusive value="1"/>           <xs:maxInclusive value="12"/>       </xs:restriction>    </xs:simpleType>  </xs:element>
Abstract class for common method and properties of WorkDocument, StockMovement and invoice
Get Set the ATCUD This field shall contain the Document Unique Code.

Set the ATCUD
This field shall contain the Document Unique Code.

return.description: true if the value is valid

description.compact:
Get hash
The signature in the terms of Ordinance nº 363/2010 of 23rd June.

Set Hash
The signature in the terms of Ordinance nº 363/2010 of 23rd June.

return.description: true if the value is valid

description.compact:
Get hash control
Version of the protected key used in the creation of signature of field 4.2.3.4. – Hash.

Set hash control
Version of the protected key used in the creation of signature of field 4.2.3.4. – Hash.

return.description: true if the value is valid

description.compact:
Get period
The month of the taxation period shall be indicated from “1” to “12”, counting from the start.

docblock.description:
<xs:element ref = "Period" minOccurs = "0"/>
 <xs:element name="Period">
   <xs:simpleType>
      <xs:restriction base="xs:integer">
          <xs:minInclusive value="1"/>
          <xs:maxInclusive value="12"/>
      </xs:restriction>
   </xs:simpleType>
 </xs:element>

description.compact:
Set period
The month of the taxation period shall be indicated from “1” to “12”, counting from the start.

docblock.description:
<xs:element ref = "Period" minOccurs = "0"/>
 <xs:element name="Period">
   <xs:simpleType>
      <xs:restriction base="xs:integer">
          <xs:minInclusive value="1"/>
          <xs:maxInclusive value="12"/>
      </xs:restriction>
   </xs:simpleType>
 </xs:element>

return.description: true if the value is valid

description.compact:
Get sourceiID
User who created the document 
 <xs:element ref = "SourceID"/> <xs:element name="SourceID" type="SAFPTtextTypeMandatoryMax30Car"/>

Set sourceiID
User who created the document 
 <xs:element ref = "SourceID"/> <xs:element name="SourceID" type="SAFPTtextTypeMandatoryMax30Car"/>

return.description: true if the value is valid

description.compact:
Get EacCode
Code of the economic activity to which the document relates shall be indicated.

Set EacCode
Code of the economic activity to which the document relates shall be indicated.

return.description: true if the value is valid

description.compact:
Set System entry date
Date of the last time the record was saved at the time of signing.

docblock.description:
Shall include hour, minute and second. Date and time type: “YYYY–MM–DDThh:mm:ss”.
<xs:element ref = "SystemEntryDate"/>

description.compact:
Set System entry date
Date of the last time the record was saved at the time of signing.

docblock.description:
Shall include hour, minute and second. Date and time type: “YYYY–MM–DDThh:mm:ss”.
<xs:element ref = "SystemEntryDate"/>

description.compact:
Get transaction id
If an accounting record is created, filling in is compulsory if it is an integrated accounting and invoicing system, even if the file type (TaxAccountingBasis) shall not contain tables relating accounting.
If $create is true and a inatnce wasn't created previous a new instance will be created <xs:element ref = "TransactionID" minOccurs = "0"/>

param.description: If is true and a inatnce wasn't created previous a new instance will be created

description.compact:
Get CustomerID
The unique key of the table 2.2. - Customer respecting the rule defined for 2.2.1. - CustomerID.
<xs:element ref = "CustomerID"/>
<xs:element name="CustomerID" type="SAFPTtextTypeMandatoryMax30Car"/>

Set CustomerID
The unique key of the table 2.2. - Customer respecting the rule defined for 2.2.1. - CustomerID.
<xs:element ref = "CustomerID"/>
<xs:element name="CustomerID" type="SAFPTtextTypeMandatoryMax30Car"/>

return.description: true if the value is valid

param.description: If truncate is set to false and the string is bigger will throw AuditFileException

Format a float with grouped thousands
Convert the encoded caracters encoded by SimpleXmlElment

param.description: The field name with error, will be used as array key, if null array key will be numeric

description.compact: Validate documents number <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="[^ ]+ [^/^ ]+/[0-9]+"/> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="60"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType>
